about_the_game:
You’ve got the place all to yourself tonight, so why not summon your favorite virtual succubus, Novellus Dea, to keep you company? Pull up the online portal, select from a menu of her naughty services, and POOF! She appears right in your room, ready to fulfill all your heart’s desires! But is it virtual reality, or some darker magic, that summons her to your side? And sure, you know how to make her come, but…is there any way to convince her to stay?

P.S. The script changes if she’s visited you before, so sure to come back and play with her again and again! And keep an eye out for new services she’ll add to her menu over the coming weeks as we gear up for the full version.  You won't want to miss the surprise ending ;D

Enjoy some alone time with Novellus Dea in Unsealed Love with this early access DLC release.

Alone in your room, you decide to explore the realms of desire through a love delivery service. Little do you know, your journey into the unknown is about to take an unexpected and enchanting turn.

Meet Novellus Dea, your virtual succubus, ready to cater to your every desire. But neither of you is quite prepared for what happens when the magical seal holding your virtual connection is broken!

From the comfort of your own space, you'll embark on a unique and immersive experience, discovering a world where the lines between reality and virtual fantasy blur.

This is an early access DLC release.  All updates are included with this DLC

Upcoming features include:

  • Biology Selection

  • Many More Actions (Positions, Toys, Etc)

  • And a surprise ending you won't want to miss!

Partner: female

Player: choose your own

Content format: standing, lying down

Partner interactions: player’s choice!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains strong sexual interactions in a fantasy environment.  This includes summoning a succubus, receiving / giving oral sex, and full sexual intercourse.  All depicted characters convey consent at all times.

  • Graphics: nVidia 960 GTX
